text:
Salvador Freixedo, (23 April 1923 – 25 October 2019) was a Spanish Catholic priest. He was a member of the Jesuit Order.
He was known as a Ufologist and researcher of "paranormal subjects". He wrote many books on the relationship between religion and extraterrestrial beings, and was a speaker in several international UFO congresses in Europe, the Americas, and Asia.
He was also a contributor to a number of parascientific magazines, such as "Mundo Desconocido" ("Unknown World"), "Karma 7" and "Más allá" ("Beyond") among others.
